item.title: Mw3 means
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

marcbob:

Someone needs to make a legit war game, like 500v500 and when you die your done for the game. The map is huge and filled with all kinds of stuff you can use. I’d play it.

This would be awesome. No perks, just…
Main weapon
Side arm (pistol or shotgun)
C4 or Claymore
No weapon attachments
Massive map (size of battlefield)
Small HP (about 3 bullets from an AK47)
Weather (rain, snow)
Wind for bullet and launcher variables

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3 means
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

m.dog311:

I didn’t mean there are killstreaks in BFBC2, I’m talking about the helicopters spawn throughout the game. And I see a lot of people just running around.

They did good with the spawns of tanks/helicopters and the other shit, There only there because that base is way too hard without them…

[quote=“reyx7, post:29, topic:407466”]The idea of BF is teamwork. You have to move in a squad, you even specifically respawn with them. It takes 3 people before your helicopter is actually useful, and even then kills are hard to get. I always use landmines, gets rid of tanks and ATVs with no problem. A tracer can get down a chopper in 2 minutes, it’s all very balanced. If you use teamwork, all of that is preventable.

However, in COD, it’s just a bunch of idiots running around solo. Ever get completely destroyed in a game of S&D? It’s because the other team all has mics, and all sticks together in a pack. Teamwork will always win, no matter the game.[/quote]
3 people before heli is useful? You must be talking about the shitty ones that do no damage, I think the other helicopters are way OP though.
I don’t even know what tracers do lol, I know if you get one on a tank/heli, it shows up for everyone but i don’t see how thats useful.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3 means
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

The idea of BF is teamwork. You have to move in a squad, you even specifically respawn with them. It takes 3 people before your helicopter is actually useful, and even then kills are hard to get. I always use landmines, gets rid of tanks and ATVs with no problem. A tracer can get down a chopper in 2 minutes, it’s all very balanced. If you use teamwork, all of that is preventable.

However, in COD, it’s just a bunch of idiots running around solo. Ever get completely destroyed in a game of S&D? It’s because the other team all has mics, and all sticks together in a pack. Teamwork will always win, no matter the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3 means
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:26, topic:407466”][quote author=Jerico Pimpinbro link=topic=508752.msg3690911#msg3690911 date=1312124902]

Mw2 is really good.

Mw3 is the same engine. Hopefully the equivalence.

Black Ops seems too slow-paced for a CoD.

Black ops is all 12-year-old people running around with the 74u.
[/quote]

I like how you said that, you probabily like mw2 more.
let me rephrase it.

MW2 is all 12-year-old people running around with a sniper thinking they are good/noobtubes

OT: black ops is way better than all the other cods, the only problem i have is that its boring after half an hour whereas others i can play for hours.

EDIT:

Battlefield isn’t much more realistic. Truly, the only thing I’ve found more realistic is the bullet drop on snipers. It still takes me 2 hits with an M95 sniper to kill someone (unless I score a headshot), people still run around like they’re invincible, etc. Oh, and with you’re killstreak rant, they do the same in BFBC2. The only difference is the hellicopter is just sitting here, and you get the same faggot using it every game.

What killstreaks are those? also, no one runs around on bf unless they are trying to get to that place because otherwise they die…[/quote]
I didn’t mean there are killstreaks in BFBC2, I’m talking about the helicopters spawn throughout the game. And I see a lot of people just running around.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3 means
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I found WaW quite enjoyable, but the ww2 thing was played out.

You guys are so full of shit, mw2 was shit and so is black ops. People go “black ops is pretty good” then someone will say “they all suck”, and then theyll say “ye black ops sucks but mw2 was really good”

MW2 AND BOPS SUCK, none of them are slightly realistic other than the map and guns part.

The reason call of duty 4 was so successful is because it was innocently successful, the devs didn’t know the game would explode like it did. And now that they’re making millions per release, I doubt theyll try as hard because they keep reskinning and releasing. And little twat fanboys will still obsess over it.

Reasons the most recent call of duties suck:

Kill streaks
Im so glad a 20 million dollar fucking helicopter can come help some sorry ass in the middle of brazil, and PUNISH A TEAM FOR LOSING. You don’t give a single player free reign to frustrate everyone else, give them something acceptable like the predator missile. Once a cod is released it seems so great for the first month while everything sinks in, then soon people find the best weapons, the best camping spots, and then maps are like 50 million black guys fighting over a watermelon.

Camping!
I put this in here to piss people off! Camping is realistic! Cod faggots say it isnt, and that shows how the cod populous looks at realism.

Maps
Black ops made me mad as hell, its like their maps are fucking designed like race tracks without a single spot where you’re safe from shit. Running through alleys in real life is hardly fluid. Maybe if th- FUCK DICKHEAD MARATHON+LIGHTWEIGHT ZAPPED ME WITH AN MP5K

Guns
Always unbalanced, in every game. Cod 4 did the best out of them all but still had 2 (m16 and p90) that were a bit better with squeezing in kills. The rest of the games you could care the fuck less about trying out every gun EVERYONE IS ALREADY USING THE AK74U

Exploits
I get it, the game isnt ‘meant’ to be realistic (as some say), but there are still faggot 12 year olds that quick scope and use other exploits to their advantage, and rack up kills. Of course, this somehow makes them good in the world of cod but then theyll go and cry when anyone says the game isn’t realistic YOU’RE FUCKING ‘QUICK’ SCOPING. Just like in real life when people lay down the second they see you and shoot at your feet amirite?

Map packs
WHY THE FUCK WOULD I PAY $15 FOR 3 MAPS, SOMETIMES THE MAPS REQUIRED NO EFFORT. Im completely shocked, how, cod 4 could contain 16 mp maps, and a full campaign for only $60. And then 3 of the maps are worth $15 in a map pack. FUCK YOU YAY MORE MONIES

Emblems
Im so glad I get to see penises all over a game that is a sequel to a game that tried to be militarily accurate.

Zombies
Sigh, I don’t see how my friends can play this hours on end.

then they call wow repetitive

What they need to do to fix cod:

Make normal sized maps (about overgrown sized)
Make the game permanently hard-core mode (BOO the fuck who if you die from a toe shot. 'Sif 30 shots to the chest only making you grunt is realistic)
Add more weight to the controls, everyone is like lightning.
Make it more teamwork based, like bf.
Fix fucking sync issues
Make perks less beneficial

[quote=“Jerico Pimpinbro, post:12, topic:407466”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=508752.msg3690853#msg3690853 date=1312119710]
Mw2 is really good.
[/quote]

Mw3 is the same engine. Hopefully the equivalence.[/quote]
They’re all the same engine. I hate when people say black ops engine sucks. Its the same thing, just different artists.

Read full topic
